vault_notes.title: Trust Calibration in AI Agents
vault_notes.content: Trust calibration is crucial for ensuring AI agents perform reliably and their outputs are trusted by researchers. It involves aligning trust levels with AI capabilities and integrating user feedback to maintain trust over time.

vault_notes.title: Integrating Trust Calibration into Research Pipelines
vault_notes.content: Trust calibration should be integrated into research pipeline design with ongoing monitoring. This ensures that AI agents' trust levels align with their capabilities, enhancing reliability and efficiency.
